text: Good to see this commitment by @Merck to help ensure from the outset that molnupiravir, a potential treatment for COVID-19, will be available to many more nations. https://t.co/5gYFcYtj8a
If we’re going to end the acute phase of the pandemic, life-saving drugs like molnupiravir must be available to everyone who needs them. https://t.co/G6kxmIySGr

Still, the disparities in access to the COVID-19 vaccine are shocking and unjust. Only 2 percent of people in low-income countries have received any COVID-19 vaccines. And the gap may be getting even larger as rich-world governments buy up extra doses to serve as booster shots.

The pandemic has worsened inequities. But it's also shown the world what's possible when we come together. Read why there's reason to be optimistic in our 2021 Goalkeepers Report. https://t.co/2XUNjdwCyf
